articles.title: Kopf des Tages
articles.image_title: epa01374686 (FILE) A file photograph showing Prime Minister Imre Nagy delivering his speech to the revolutionary crowd filling the square in front of the Parliament building in Budapest on the evening of 23 October 1956, after the outbreak of the revolution against communist rule and the Soviet Union in Hungary. The playing of a 52-hour audio record of Nagy's trial by the communist controlled court begins in the headquarters of the Open Society Archives in Budapest, Hungary, 09 June 2008. The first time ever a audio recording of the trial that ended in Nagy execution has been publicly played. The occasion is the 50th anniversary of the killing of Imre Nagy on 16 June 2008. The tapes will be played in periods of the days corresponding to the original times of the trial in 1958. EPA/RUDOLF JARAI EPA/TIBOR HOLLOS
articles.author: Sven Felix Kellerhoff
